metadata.name: Space Oddity
metadata.description:
An abstract entity travels through space, with its pulsating and mutating limbs the only sign of life. The piece presents a brief cinematic experience of flight deep into a star-field, interweaving the viewer's perspective with that of this sole traveller. 

The generative algorithm, written entirely in Processing, combines phase-shifted dynamics along the ribboned arms with sweeping camera movements.

Made by Siddhartha Mukherjee in April 2022.

...

1920x1080
60 seconds loop
